item.title: Gerrit前端开发
item.description: Gerrit Polymer Frontend Follow the setup instructions for Gerrit backend developers where applicable. Installing Bazel Follow the instructions here to get and install Bazel. Installing Node.js and npm packages The minimum nodejs version supported is 8.x+ # Debian experimental sudo apt-get install nodejs-legacy sudo apt-get install npm # OS X with Homebrew brew install node brew install npm All other platforms: download from nodejs.org. Various steps below require installing additional npm packages.

item.title: 子女教育注意事项
item.description: 赏文品意 中国式“自己的事情自己做”，正在让孩子一步步走向自卑
